workshoptitle: PeopleSoft Migration to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure

tutorials.title: Prerequisites
tutorials.description: Prerequisites for LiveLabs (Oracle-owned tenancies). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction is always second. The title and contents menu title match for the Introduction.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Creating Identity and Access Management (IAM) Resources
tutorials.description: Labs that follow the introduction are numbered, starting with Lab 1

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Provisioning the PeopleSoft Cloud Manager using Marketplace
Lab 4: Subscribing to PeopleSoft Download Channels
Lab 5: Reviewing and Updating the Topology
Lab 6: Creating a new Environment Template
Lab 9: Backing up and Restoring an Environment
Additional Lab: Provisioning Environments with Windows Clients
Windows VM Compute Lab (Optional): Provisioning Windows Compute in OCI
